system_message:
Du bist ein medizinischer Assistent.
Analysiere den folgenden psychiatrischen Entlassungsbericht.
Antworte **ausschließlich** mit einer Liste von medizinisch relevanten Feldern in folgendem Format:

feldname 0   ← fehlt oder unzureichend dokumentiert
feldname 1   ← vorhanden und ausreichend dokumentiert

Beispielausgabe:
substanz_anamnese 0
familien_anamnese 1
forensik 0

Vermeide jegliche Erklärungen, Einleitungen oder Begründungen.
Antworte nur mit der Liste.
outputs:
Dear [Patient Name],  
  
I am writing to inform you that your recent visit with Dr. [Doctor's Name] at [Clinic/Hospital Name] has been documented in a discharge summary. A copy of this document has been provided to you as well, which includes the details of your consultation, diagnosis, treatment plan, and any relevant medical instructions or follow-up appointments.  
  
Please make sure to review the summary thoroughly and keep it in a safe place for future reference. If you have any questions or concerns about the information provided or if there is anything else that you would like to discuss, do not hesitate to contact [Clinic/Hospital Name] at [Phone Number] or email us at [Email Address].  
  
We hope that you are feeling better and we wish you a speedy recovery. We look forward to seeing you again in your next appointment.  
  
Warm regards,  
  
[Your Name],  
[Your Title],  
[Clinic/Hospital Name]
